definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off

sentences.english: He led in the 100, meter race.
They ran an 800-metre race that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天他們進行了八百米賽跑。

sentences.english: Henry is in for the100 meters and the high jump.
sentences.chinese: 亨利昨參加百米賽跑及跳高。

sentences.english: He came in second in the 800 meter race.
sentences.chinese: 他得八百米賽跑第二名。

sentences.english: There were 12 competitors in the two-hundred-metre race.
sentences.chinese: 有十二名選手參加二百米賽跑。

sentences.english: She won first prize in the 100 metres race.
sentences.chinese: 她在百米賽跑中獲頭獎。

sentences.english: I'm in for the100 meters and the high jump.
sentences.chinese: 我參加百米賽跑和跳高。

sentences.english: Tom's little brother ran third in the 100-metre race.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的小弟弟在百米賽跑中跑第三。

sentences.english: He's glad that he won the 100-metre race.
sentences.chinese: 他贏得了百米賽跑很高興。

sentences.english: There were 12 competitors in the two-hundred-metre dash.
sentences.chinese: 有十二名選手參加二百米賽跑。

sentences.english: We are thinking of putting young Peter in for the 100 meters.
sentences.chinese: 我們想叫小彼得報名參加百米賽跑。

sentences.english: Let me congratulate you on your winning first place in the 100 metre dash.
sentences.chinese: 祝賀你獲得百米賽跑第一名。

sentences.english: There were 12 competitors in the two-hundred-meter dash.
sentences.chinese: 有十二名選手參加二百米賽跑。

sentences.english: Li Lei beat all the runners in the 100-metre race.
sentences.chinese: 李磊在百米賽跑中贏了所有的對手。

sentences.english: He came second in the 100-meter race.
sentences.chinese: 他在百米賽跑中獲得了第二名。
